-1.title: Raa Raa and the Rainy Stick

episode of.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion (TV Series 2011– )

-1.plot:

1.title: A Time to be Quiet, a Time to Be Loud

episode of.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: Raa Raa has spotted an exciting new thing in the jungle. What could it be? As they try to get close to the "flappy fly", Raa Raa discovers that some situations call for absolute quiet... not something our noisy little lion is very good at!

2.title: The Right Sound

episode of.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: One of the pipes on Huffty's Toot Stick has broken. Can Raa Raa help his friend find the "right" sound to replace it in the jungle so they can play loud music together?

3.title: Huffty Loses His Voice

episode of.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: Huffty has lost his voice. While Raa Raa and his friends try and work out what has happened to it, Huffty has to mime to make himself understood

4.title: Raa Raa Finds a Voice

episode of.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Raa Raa is upset when Topsy suggests that he should stick to doing "Raa Raa" things. He sets out to prove Topsy wrong. Will the noisy little lion learn that sometimes it's best just to be yourself?

5.title: Zebby's Snack Time

episode of.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Zebby likes to have a snack when she is feeling tired. Raa Raa thinks this is a great idea and decides to join his friend. Except he thinks they should have their snack in the perfect place... but everywhere they try is just too noisy... I wonder why that could be?!

6.title: Finding Noisy

episode of.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Raa Raa gets carried away when collecting fun noisy objects in the jungle with his friends. Raa Raa wants to keep everything he finds for himself, but soon discovers that his collection isn't much fun with nobody to share it with.

7.title: Ooo Ooo's Jungle Drums

episode of.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: Raa Raa has found an infectious beat, and soon all the other animals in the jungle are joining in... except for Ooo Ooo, who just can't get the beat right. How can they find a way for all the friends to play together?

8.title: Topsy's Musical Stones

episode of.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: Topsy has readied the musical stones for a noisy game. Raa Raa has been left in charge, making sure that nobody jumps on them while Topsy reminds the other jungle inhabitants about the game. But temptation can be strong... especially when Ooo Ooo is about...

9.title: Raa Raa's Noisy Present

episode of.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: Raa Raa has made his friend Topsy a wonderful present - a noisy set of chimes. But she doesn't want them. Who else in the jungle might like a very noisy set of wind chimes?

10.title: Raa Raa's Big Roar

episode of.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: Raa Raa discovers that all his friends come running when he roars really loudly.

11.title: Scritch Scratch

episode of.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: Raa Raa always scratches his claws in the morning, but his scratching post has fallen apart. He sets off to find himself a new one in the jungliest bit. When he does eventually find a new scratching post it is huge, how is he going to get it home again?

12.title: Hurry Up Raa Raa

episode of.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion (TV Series 2011– )

12.plot: Raa Raa has agreed to do too many things with too many people today. Will he be able to do them and keep all his friends happy? More importantly, will it make him happy?

13.title: Rumble in the Jungle

episode of.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion (TV Series 2011– )

13.plot: Zebby is upset when Raa Raa laughs at her rumbling tummy and runs off to hide. Raa Raa sets out to find his friend and apologise... he thinks it will be easy, he just has to listen out for the sound of her tummy, but who knew how many other rumbling noises there were?

14.title: Raa Raa's Favourite Noise

episode of.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion (TV Series 2011– )

14.plot: Raa Raa lives in the Jingly Jangly Jungle with his friends, where there is so much to do, see and hear. Topsy the Giraffe, Huffty the Elephant, Crocky the Crocodile, Zebby the Zebra and Ooo Ooo the Monkey along with their favourite friend, Raa Raa, use rhyme and rhythm to learn and have lots of noisy fun together.

15.title: Ooo Ooo Slips Up

episode of.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion (TV Series 2011– )

15.plot: Raa Raa lives in the Jingly Jangly Jungle with his friends, where there is so much to do, see and hear. Topsy the Giraffe, Huffty the Elephant, Crocky the Crocodile, Zebby the Zebra and Ooo Ooo the Monkey along with their favourite friend, Raa Raa, use rhyme and rhythm to learn and have lots of noisy fun together.

imdb.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion
plot: It features a lion name Raa Raa and his adventures and activities with his friends Topsy, Zebby, Hufty, Ooo Ooo and Crocky in the Jingly Jangly Jungle.
